settings.text:
Got any Question?

What is Kiwi Kisan Window?

Kiwi Kisan Window is a farm-to-fork initiative connecting consumers directly with organic and sustainably grown produce from Indian farmers. We focus on transparency, quality, and ethical sourcing.

What makes your products different?

All our products are sourced from verified organic farms or naturally grown by local farmers using sustainable agricultural practices. We avoid the use of harmful chemicals, pesticides, or artificial preservatives.

Are your products certified organic?

Yes, most of our products come with organic certifications such as NPOP or USDA Organic. We also work with natural farmers who follow traditional practices but may not yet have certifications.

Where do you source your produce from?

We work directly with small and marginal farmers across India, including regions like Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh, Maharashtra, and the North-East, depending on the crop and season.

How do you ensure quality and safety?

We follow a strict quality control process including farm audits, regular testing for residues, and proper storage and handling during logistics. Transparency is key to our operations.

How can I place an order?

You can order via our website or mobile app. We also take orders through WhatsApp and social media in some areas. Please visit our website for more details.

Do you offer home delivery?

Yes, we offer home delivery in select cities. Shipping timelines and charges vary by location. You’ll see delivery options at checkout.

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>
.rich-text__text h4:nth-child(1) {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.rich-text__text h4:not(.rich-text__text h4:nth-child(1)),
.rich-text__text p {
  padding-left: 20px;
}

.rich-text__text h4 ~ p {
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.rich-text__text h4:not(.rich-text__text h4:nth-child(1)) {
  font-size: 22px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  position: relative;
}
.rich-text__text h4:not(.rich-text__text h4:nth-child(1))::after {
  content: "•";
  position: absolute;
  top: 10%;
  left: 0;
}
.rich-text__blocks {
  max-width: 100%;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {

h2.rich-text__heading {
    font-size: 24px;
}

.rich-text__text h4:nth-child(1) {
  font-size: 16px;
}

.rich-text__text h4:not(.rich-text__text h4:nth-child(1)) {
  font-size: 14px;
margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.rich-text__text h4 ~ p {
font-size: 14px;
 margin-bottom: 15px;
}

}
</style>
